attributes.action: make Elvis Presley's birthday a national holiday!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it's time we all celebrate the birth of The King by taking one day out of the year to sing Elvis songs, dress up in rhinestone jumpsuits and exchange Elvis related goodies. January 8th shall be the day of this much needed and good humoured day of rest.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
